title: MAG 151 - Big Picture Transcript
text:
s. For everyone. 
(Long pause.) 
BASIRA 
You’re not expecting to come out of this, are you? 
MARTIN 
I’ll do what I have to. If I’m right, no one else needs to get hurt. 
BASIRA 
(Sigh) Okay. You want to do whatever grand sacrifice you think is going to save 
everyone, go ahead. But you’d best be sure you’re not just playing their game. 

The Magnus Archives – 151 – Big Picture 
26 
 
MARTIN 
I know what I’m doing. 
BASIRA 
We’ll see. Don’t make me regret this. 
MARTIN 
Yeah. 
Don’t tell Jon. Please. 
BASIRA 
Fine. I can’t promise you he won’t just Know it, though. 
MARTIN 
How is he? 
BASIRA 
Hungry. But he’s keeping it together. 
MARTIN 
(Exhales) that’s good. Can I go now? 
BASIRA 
Sure. 

The Magnus Archives – 151 – Big Picture 
27 
 
(A sigh.) 
[Tape clicks off.] 
[The Magnus Archives Theme – Outro]

Today’s episode was written by Jonathan Sims and directed by Alexander J 
Newall. 
It featured: Karim Kronfli as Simon Fairchild, Alexander J Newall as Martin 
Blackwood, and Frank Voss as Basira Hussein.
